track.name: Zion Train
comments: there's a train coming people r we ready
Sometimes I feel like Bob truly was a prophet, sent to us directly from Zion, Selassie is the chapel! peace, love, unity.

Awesome track; it’s just so dynamic and really stands out against most of the roots being made at the time. As always you get a lesson on life and spirituality from Bob but as an added bonus you get that infectious chorus & bridge. Fantastic!
Revolucionário, sempre representando a palavra de Jeová por onde andou.
Pimper's paradise just bowls me over...........!!!!!!!!!
Where there's a will, there's always a way...
Don't gain the world and lose your soul.  Wisdom is better than silver and gold.
